About This Page

The "Profile Comment Delete" page allows authors of comments, owner of the wall, and Super Admins to delete one any applicable profile comments. You can pass a comment ID in the URI or you can hard code it using the 'comment_id' template parameter

It makes use of the following functions:

  • Friends:Profile_Comment_Delete to delete a profile wall comment.
